metadata.Title: CVE-2019-2741 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Vulnerability in the MySQL Server component of Oracle MySQL (subcomponent:Server: Audit Log). Supported versions that are affected are 5.7.26 andprior and 8.0.16 and prior. Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows lowprivileged attacker with network access via multiple protocols tocompromise MySQL Server. Successful attacks of this vulnerability canresult in unauthorized ability to cause a hang or frequently repeatablecrash (complete DOS) of MySQL Server. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 5.3 (Availabilityimpacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:H).

criterions.comment: mysql-5.5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mariadb-5.5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
percona-xtradb-cluster-5.5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
